tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE energy_consumption (
  consumption_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  plant_id INT,
  month VARCHAR(20),
  year INT,
  energy_consumed DECIMAL(10,2),
  FOREIGN KEY (plant_id) REFERENCES packaging_plants(plant_id)
);

CREATE TABLE energy_consumption_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    plant_id INT,
    energy_consumed DECIMAL,
    date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (plant_id) REFERENCES packaging_plants(plant_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Production_Lines (
  line_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  line_name VARCHAR(100),
  line_capacity DECIMAL,
  plant_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (plant_id) REFERENCES Packaging_Plants(plant_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Energy_Usage (
  usage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  energy_consumed DECIMAL,
  product_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES Products(product_id)
);

CREATE TABLE packaging_production (
    production_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    plant_id INT,
    production_date DATE,
    total_output DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (plant_id) REFERENCES packaging_plants(plant_id)
);

CREATE TABLE plant_energy_sources (
    plant_id INT,
    source_id INT,
    energy_consumed DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (plant_id) REFERENCES packaging_plants(plant_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (source_id) REFERENCES energy_sources(source_id)
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    plant_id INT,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(100),
    details TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (plant_id) REFERENCES packaging_plants(plant_id)
);
